body:
Successfully installed with and without all variants on macOS 10.13.4 with Clang 9.0.0.

I couldn't find a way to disable the `libtiff` dependency, at least with the Autotools build. They also have a CMake build but I didn't mess with it. The `README` instructions use Autotools, so I assume it is the recommended installation technique.
title: Add libgeotiff package
